bio.title: About
paragraphs: I'm a Software Engineer with 5 years of experience building web applications. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and solving complex problems.
I enjoy working with modern technologies and continuously learning new skills to stay current in the field.

portfolio.title: Project One
portfolio.description: A web application built with React and Node.js.

portfolio.title: Project Two
portfolio.description: An API service built with Python and FastAPI.

summary: Software Engineer with 5 years of experience building web applications. Proficient in JavaScript, Python, and React. Strong problem-solving skills and experience working in agile teams.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using React and Node.js
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver features
Write unit tests and participate in code reviews

experience.title: Junior Developer
responsibilities: Fixed bugs and implemented new features
